name: Pacific Oysters
description: Half dozen freshly shucked oysters with a ginger-scallion mignonette.

name: Wagyu Gyoza
description: Pan-fried dumplings filled with premium Wagyu beef, served with a chili soy dipping sauce.

name: Miso Black Cod
description: Marinated and broiled, served with pickled ginger stem.

name: Dragon's Breath
description: A fiery blend of premium vodka, ginger liqueur, and a hint of chili, garnished with a smoked cinnamon stick.

name: Crispy Duck Rolls
description: Tender duck meat, shredded and mixed with fresh vegetables, wrapped in a crispy spring roll shell.

name: Single Pack
description: 1x Steamed Dumplings (4pcs), 1x Crispy Vegetable Spring Rolls (2pcs), 1x Choice of Soft Drink.

name: TWOBAYS
description: A refreshing, gluten-free beer with a crisp finish.
